Vice-Premier Meets Chinese Delegation
   Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier of the DPRK Cabinet, met and had a friendly talk with the Chinese civil aviation delegation led by Li Jiaxiang, director of the Administration of Civil Aviation of China, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.
